strapiPost.title: Stone Mill Bread Announces Fayetteville Location Will Reopen
strapiPost.content:
Fayetteville, wipe your tears! Like a phoenix reborn, Stone Mill Bread will return to its flagship location on Gregg Ave after completing a remodel.

  • It's not goodbye: The local-favorite bakery and cafe closed unexpectedly in October 2022, citing long-term lease negotiations as the reason and devastating the city's sandwich lovers.
  • Meanwhile: The completion date of the remodel is currently unknown, but in the meantime, Stone Mill-Super Fans of Fayetteville can make the drive up to their other locations in Springdale and Bentonville.

Stay tuned for updates HERE.
